SemgrepCodeVulnerabilityReport.schema:
#Step 3: Define the Standard Schema 
 ## Code Vulnerability
 ```json
{
 //Meta 
 "System": "semgrep",
 "Source": "compliancecow",

 //Resource info 
 "ResourceID": "N/A",
 "ResourceName": "semgrep/repo1",
 "ResourceType": "Repository",
 "ResourceLocation": "N/A",
 "ResourceTags": "N/A",
 "ResourceURL": "https://github.com/semgrep/semgrep/blob/39f95450a7d4d70e54c9edbd109bed8210a36889/src/core_cli/Core_CLI.ml#L1",

 //Data 
 "VulnerabilityID": "1234567",
 "SemgrepRuleName": "typescript.react.security.audit.react-no-refs.react-no-refs", 
 "Description": "{findings.rule.message}", 
 "FilePath": "frontend/src/corpComponents/Code.tsx",
 "StartLine": 120,
 "EndLine": 124,
 "Status": "open",
 "Severity": "medium",
 "Confidence": "medium",
 "SemgrepFindingURL": "https://semgrep.dev.com/orgs/deploymentid/findings/012345",

 //Compliance details 
 "ValidationStatusCode": "HI_VULN_FOUND",
 "ValidationStatusNotes": "High vulnerabilities found in the repository scanned by Semgrep.",
 "ComplianceStatus": "NON_COMPLIANT",
 "ComplianceStatusReason": "The record is non-compliant because the repository scanned by Semgrep identifies vulnerabilities that pose potential security risks.",
 "EvaluatedTime": "2024-07-06T17:17:28.109334Z",

 //User editable data 
 "UserAction": "",

 //Action editable data 
 "ActionStatus": "",
 "ActionResponseURL": ""
}
```

SemgrepCodeVulnerabilityReport.compliancetaxonomy:
#Step 4: Describe the Compliance Taxonomy 
 ## Code Vulnerability
 |ValidationStatusCode|ValidationStatusNotes|ComplianceStatus|ComplianceStatusReason|
 |---|---|---|---|
 |CRIT_VULN_FOUND|Critical vulnerabilities found in the repository scanned by Semgrep.|NON_COMPLIANT|The record is non-compliant because the repository scanned by Semgrep identifies vulnerabilities that pose potential security risks.|
|HI_VULN_FOUND|High vulnerabilities found in the repository scanned by Semgrep.|NON_COMPLIANT|The record is non-compliant because the repository scanned by Semgrep identifies vulnerabilities that pose potential security risks.|
 |MED_VULN_FOUND|Medium vulnerabilities found in the repository scanned by Semgrep.|NON_COMPLIANT|The record is non-compliant because the repository scanned by Semgrep identifies vulnerabilities that pose potential security risks.|
 |LOW_VULN_FOUND|Low vulnerabilities found in the repository scanned by Semgrep.|NON_COMPLIANT|The record is non-compliant because the repository scanned by Semgrep identifies vulnerabilities that pose potential security risks.|
|VULN_FIXED|Vulnerabilities found and it's fixed, as per the recent scan result.|COMPLIANT|The record is compliant because the vulnerabilities were found and fixed, as per the recent scan result by Semgrep.|

SemgrepCodeFindingsSummaryReport.schema:
#Step 3: Define the Standard Schema 
 ## Code Findings Summary Report
 ```json
{
 //Meta 
 "System": "semgrep", 
 "Source": "compliancecow", 

 //Resource info 
 "ResourceID": "N/A", 
 "ResourceName": "semgrep/repo1", 
 "ResourceType": "Repository", 
 "ResourceLocation": "N/A",
 "ResourceTags": "N/A",
 "ResourceURL": "https://github.com/semgrep/repo1",

 //Data 
 "TotalCodeVulnerabilityCount": 18, 
 "CodeVulnerabilityLowSeverityCount": 0, 
 "CodeVulnerabilityMediumSeverityCount": 18, 
 "CodeVulnerabilityHighSeverityCount": 0,
 "CodeVulnerabilityCriticalSeverityCount": 0,
 "CodeOpenVulnerabilityCount": 18,
 "CodeReviewingVulnerabilityCount": 0,
 "CodeFixingVulnerabilityCount": 0,

 //Compliance details 
 "ValidationStatusCode": "NO_CRITICAL_NO_HIGH_CODE_SEV_PRE",
 "ValidationStatusNotes": "Contains No Critical and No High severity code vulnerabilities.", 
 "ComplianceStatus": "COMPLIANT", 
 "ComplianceStatusReason": "Record is compliant as we have only Low or Medium severity code vulnerabilities found.", 
 "EvaluatedTime": "2024-08-19T09:05:47.940834Z",

 //User editable data 
 "UserAction": "", 

 //Action editable data 
 "ActionStatus": "", 
 "ActionResponseURL": ""
}
```

SemgrepCodeFindingsSummaryReport.compliancetaxonomy:
#Step 4: Describe the Compliance Taxonomy 
 ## Code Findings Summary Report
 |ValidationStatusCode|ValidationStatusNotes|ComplianceStatus|ComplianceStatusReason|
 |---|---|---|---|
 | NO_CRITICAL_NO_HIGH_CODE_SEV_PRE | Contains No Critical and No High severity code vulnerabilities. | COMPLIANT| Record is compliant as we have only Low or Medium severity code vulnerabilities found. |
 | X_CRITICAL_NO_HIGH_CODE_SEV_PRE | Contains X Critical and No High severity code vulnerabilities. | NON_COMPLIANT| Record is not compliant as we have High or Critical severity code vulnerabilities found. |
 | NO_CRITICAL_X_HIGH_CODE_SEV_PRE | Contains No Critical and X High severity code vulnerabilities. | NON_COMPLIANT| Record is not compliant as we have High or Critical severity code vulnerabilities found. |
 | X_CRITICAL_X_HIGH_CODE_SEV_PRE | Contains X Critical and X High severity code vulnerabilities. | NON_COMPLIANT| Record is not compliant as we have High or Critical severity code vulnerabilities found. |
 | NO_CODE_VULN_FND | This project {project_name} contains no code vulnerability findings. | COMPLIANT| Record is compliant since no code vulnerabilities were found.|
